content: लक्ष्मी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [लक्ष्-ई मुट् च <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Fortune, prosperity, wealth; सा लक्ष्मीरुपकुरुते यया परेषां <ls>Ki. 8. 13</ls>; मातर्लक्ष्मि तव प्रसादवशतो दोषा अमी स्युर्गुणाः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>, <ls>Bh. 3. 64</ls>; तृणमिव लघुलक्ष्मीर्नैव तान् संरुणद्धि <ls>Bh. 2. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Good fortune, good luck. {@--3@} Success, accomplishment; <ls>U. 4. 10.</ls> {@--4@} Beauty, loveliness, grace, charm, splendour; lustre; मलिनमपि हिमांशोर्लक्ष्म लक्ष्मीं तनोति <ls>Ś. 1. 20</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 24</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 25</ls>; लक्ष्मीमुवाह सकलस्य शशांकमूर्तेः <ls>Ki. 2. 59</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">5. 39</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 5.">52</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">9. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 49.</ls> {@--5@} The goddess of fortune, prosperity and beauty, regarded as the wife of Viṣṇu. (She is said to have sprung from the ocean along with the other precious things or ‘jewels’ when it was churned for nectar by the gods and demons); इयं गेहे लक्ष्मीः <ls>U. 1. 39.</ls> {@--6@} Royal or sovereign power, dominion; (<ab>oft.</ab> personified as a wife of the king and regarded as a rival of the queen); तामेकभार्यां परिवादभीरोः साध्वीमपि त्यक्तवतो नृपस्य . वक्षस्यसंघट्टसुखं वसंती रेजे सपत्नीरहितेव लक्ष्मीः .. <ls>R. 14. 86</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 26.</ls> {@--7@} The wife of a hero. {@--8@} A pearl. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of turmeric. {@--10@} Superhuman power. {@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of the eleventh digit of the moon.
